changeSet.author: hparry
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE ruleform.combined_authorizations ( id bigserial NOT NULL, product1 bigint, resource1 bigint, location1 bigint, relationship bigint NOT NULL, product2 bigint, resource2 bigint, location2 bigint, parent_transitive_relationship bigint, child_transitive_relationship bigint, description character varying, notes character varying, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone,
CONSTRAINT authorization_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT authorization_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT parent_not_null CHECK (ruleform.null_zero(product1) + ruleform.null_zero(resource1) + ruleform.null_zero(location1) = 1), CONSTRAINT child_not_null CHECK (ruleform.null_zero(product2) + ruleform.null_zero(resource2) + ruleform.null_zero(location2) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.combined_authorizations IS 'Authorizations to join networks of ruleforms';
